title: Implement Multi-Factor Authentication mechanism
description: As a customer, I want to use a secure login process with multiple verification factors, so that my account remains protected.
attributes_and_rules: Combine password, OTP, and biometric verification; Implement session timeout; Device recognition; Encrypted storage of authentication tokens; Adhere to PCI-DSS compliance standards.
core_domain_objects: Authentication tokens, User sessions, Device data
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can log in with a combination of password, OTP, and biometric verification. 2. Session times out after a period of inactivity. 3. Devices are recognized upon subsequent logins. 4. Authentication tokens are stored securely and encrypted.
test_cases:
Given a user, when they log in using correct credentials and the provided OTP, then they should be successfully authenticated.
Given a user, when their session times out due to inactivity, then they should be required to log in again.
Given a previously authenticated device, when a user logs in again, then the device should be recognized.
Given all authentication data, when it is stored, then it should be encrypted.

title: Develop a dynamic personalized banking dashboard
description: As a customer, I want a personalized dashboard displaying my financial products and services, so that I can easily access relevant information and offers.
attributes_and_rules: Present account information, personalized offers, and product recommendations; Provide quick access to account balances, transactions, and shortcuts; Ensure real-time updates with a visually appealing layout.
core_domain_objects: User profiles, Account data, Offers, Recommendations
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can see their account details and personalized offers on the dashboard. 2. Real-time updates are reflected in account balances and transactions. 3. Shortcuts to manage services are accessible.
test_cases:
Given a user, when they access the dashboard, then they should see their account balance and transactions.
Given user profile data, when offers are personalized, then only relevant offers should be shown.
Given updated account information, when user refreshes the dashboard, then the information should be up to date.

title: Design a responsive web interface
description: As a customer, I want the portal to perform optimally across all my devices, so that I can have a consistent and accessible experience.
attributes_and_rules: Adjust to different screen sizes and devices; Implement accessibility features compliant with WCAG standards; Maintain consistent navigation, load speed, and interactivity.
acceptance_criteria: 1. The interface adjusts to desktop, tablet, and mobile screens. 2. Accessibility features are in place meeting WCAG standards. 3. Navigation and interaction are consistent across all devices.
test_cases:
Given a desktop, tablet, or mobile device, when a user accesses the portal, then the layout should adjust accordingly.
Given WCAG standards, when accessibility features are tested, then they should meet compliance requirements.
Given various browsers and OS, when the portal is accessed, then it should perform consistently.

epic_title: Digital Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
title: Build guided workflows for account opening and service modifications
description: As a customer, I want guided workflows for opening accounts or modifying services, so that I can complete these processes quickly and efficiently.
attributes_and_rules: Guided steps with minimal manual input; Automated eligibility checks and digital KYC verification; Real-time process tracking and backend system connectivity.
core_domain_objects: Account data, Service modifications, KYC information, Workflow steps
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can follow guided steps to open new accounts or modify existing services. 2. Eligibility and KYC checks are automated. 3. Real-time tracking of workflow progress is available.
test_cases:
Given a customer, when they initiate a new account or modify services, then they should be guided through the process.
Given user data, when eligibility and KYC checks are performed, then they should happen automatically.
Given an ongoing workflow, when progress is tracked, then its status should be updated in real time.

title: Introduce save-and-resume feature
description: As a customer, I want to save my application progress and resume later, so that I can complete it at my convenience without data loss.
attributes_and_rules: Securely save progress; Use encrypted storage and session tracking; Progress indicators and automated reminders.
core_domain_objects: Application data, User sessions, Progress status
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can securely save their progress on applications. 2. Progress is stored encrypted and tracked. 3. Users receive reminders for incomplete applications.
test_cases:
Given an incomplete application, when a user saves progress, then their data should be securely stored.
Given stored progress, when a user resumes the application, then their previous progress should be loaded.
Given an incomplete application, when reminders are set, then users should receive notifications.

title: Implement secure document upload functionality
description: As a customer, I want to upload and verify documents securely through the portal, so that my applications can be processed without delays.
attributes_and_rules: Support multiple file types; Encrypted upload and backend verification; Real-time updates for document approval/rejection.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can upload documents of various file types securely. 2. Uploaded documents are encrypted. 3. Backend systems verify documents and provide real-time status updates.
test_cases:
Given different file types, when a document is uploaded, then it should be supported and encrypted.
Given uploaded documents, when they are verified by backend systems, then the status should be updated in real time.
Given secure upload, when a document is processed, then it should be encrypted.

title: Develop real-time request tracking and notification system
description: As a customer, I want real-time status updates and notifications for my submitted requests, so that I am always informed of my application's progress.
attributes_and_rules: Live status tracking; Integrate notification services (email, SMS, in-portal alerts); Synchronization with backend systems.
acceptance_criteria: 1. Users can see live status updates of their requests. 2. Notifications are sent through various channels. 3. Backend systems are synchronized to provide accurate information.
test_cases:
Given a submitted request, when its status is updated, then users should see the live updates.
Given notification services, when an event occurs, then users should receive email or SMS alerts.
Given backend synchronization, when a request status changes, then the update should be reflected accurately.

epic_title: Comprehensive Interaction History and Activity Log
title: Implement comprehensive interaction history and activity log
description: As a customer, I want to track my interaction history with the portal, so that I have a complete record of all activities and status changes.
attributes_and_rules: Capture user events (login, document uploads, service requests); Include timestamps and status changes; Provide summarized view for customers and detailed reports for administrators.
acceptance_criteria: 1. User events and interactions are captured with timestamps. 2. Users can see a summarized view of their interaction history. 3. Administrators can generate detailed reports for compliance.
test_cases:
Given user events, when interactions are logged, then timestamps and status changes should be recorded.
Given interaction history, when a user views it, then they should see a summarized view.
Given logged activities, when reports are generated, then administrators should see detailed history.

title: Develop API-based integration with core banking system
description: As a customer, I want seamless integration with the bank's core system, so that I can get real-time processing for my requests.
attributes_and_rules: Two-way data exchange for inquiries and updates; Asynchronous synchronization; Error management and retry mechanisms.
core_domain_objects: API endpoints, Data synchronization, Error logs
acceptance_criteria: 1. The portal supports two-way data exchange with the core banking system. 2. Real-time data synchronization is in place. 3. Error management and retry mechanisms minimize downtime.
test_cases:
Given an API endpoint, when a transaction inquiry is made, then the data should be updated in real-time.
Given synchronization tools, when data changes, then it should sync asynchronously.
Given error management, when an error occurs, then retry mechanisms should handle it.

title: Implement role-based access control
description: As an administrator, I want role-based access management, so that user access is controlled based on profiles and authorization levels.
attributes_and_rules: Define permissions for user roles; Centralized audit visibility; Privilege escalation requests; Session monitoring.
core_domain_objects: User roles, Access permissions, Session logs
acceptance_criteria: 1. User roles are defined with specific permissions. 2. Access actions are recorded for audit. 3. Privilege escalation and session monitoring are supported.
test_cases:
Given user roles, when access permissions are set, then they should match role requirements.
Given audit logs, when access actions occur, then they should be recorded.
Given access requests, when privilege escalation is needed, then it should be handled.

epic_title: Dedicated Portal Database and Performance Optimization
title: Maintain high-performance database for self-service portal
description: As a customer, I want the portal data to be stored in a high-performance database, so that my interactions are processed efficiently during peak times.
attributes_and_rules: Secure and optimized database architecture; Caching, indexing, and performance tuning; Data encryption, automated backups, and failover mechanisms.
core_domain_objects: Database schema, Encryption keys, Backup schedules
acceptance_criteria: 1. Database is optimized for high performance. 2. Data encryption and automated backups are in place. 3. Failover mechanisms ensure continuous availability.
test_cases:
Given peak loads, when database operations are performed, then they should be efficient.
Given sensitive data, when stored, then it should be encrypted.
Given system failures, when failover mechanisms are tested, then they should ensure availability.
